name: Pancakes

ingredients: 35 g butter (if unsalted, add 1 g of salt)
Oil and or butter to grease the pan
Baking powder (Up to 2 tsp. The less you add the more dense they will be. I personally don't like them too airy.)

instructions: - In a bowl whisk the egg with the sugar, and separately heat the butter to melt it.
- Pour in the butter, vanilla, milk, mix well and add the flour in batches while whisking.
- Heat up a pan and grease it. Once it's hot, pour the mixture in (rather slowly) to make pancakes. Turn them with a spatula when they start bubbling on top.
variants: On top of the result it's common to add berries, syrup, honey...

culinary: You can do them by hand, but the mixer makes it smoother and faster.
